You muster up all of your courage.
"...Joe..."
The girl smiles again.
"My name's Brianna, by the way."
You smile slightly.

She's wearing pink tube socks, light blue jeans and an orange long-sleeve shirt. There's a pair of DC skater shoes in a corner, and a strong odour coming from her socked feet.

1451.content:
Seeing your trembling form in front of her, your new owner reaches down to pick you up. Your first instinct is to try and make a break for it, but you quickly realize that you have no chance of escaping from her. Not wanting to make this giantess angry, you simply freeze in place and allow her to take you into her hands. You are now freaking out, and you look up to see her enormous index finger heading straight for you. You immediately tense up your body and shut your eyes in anticipation of the pain that you know is coming. However, that pain never comes. Before you know it, you feel her massive finger stoking your back, as if trying to calm you down. You can't believe it; this giant girl is actually trying to comfort you. Maybe she doesn't plan on harming you after all. Before you can open your mouth to speak, you hear the girl's sweet and relaxing voice coming from above you.

"Don't worry little guy, I'm not going to hurt you. I just want to know your name."

Hearing this is like a miracle to you. Only moments ago, you knew that your death would be coming soon. You open your eyes and look up to see the girl's massive face smiling down at you. Despite still being a bit skeptical about her intentions, you have started to calm down a bit. Not wanting to get on her bad side, you decide that it would be best to play along and answer her question.

"I'm Gary... What exactly do you plan to do with me?"

She retracts the hand that she was stroking you with and proceeds to answer your question.

"Don't worry Gary, like I said, I'm not going to hurt you... I just want you to be my friend... Is that okay with you?"

You are shocked by this statement. Here you are, literally in the hands of this enormous cute girl. You were the size of a doll to her. She could easily force you to be her slave, or torture you, or do anything else that she wanted to you. Yet despite all this, she just asked you to be her friend! She wasn't even using her size advantage to force you to be her friend. She had actually ASKED you, as if she truly cared about your opinion! This all seemed way too good to be true...

"Ummm, don't take this the wrong way Mistress Siera-"

Just then she cut you off mid-sentence...

"Please Gary, there's no need for you to be so formal. You can just call me Siera."

"Okay then Siera... Anyway, you do realize that your big enough to do anything that you want with me, right?"

she simply giggled and nodded her head.

"So why would you want to be friends with me? I would think that most girls would jump at the chance to have someone like me as their personal slave... Why are you being so nice to me?"

Siera's smile disappears into a pouting face. You feel like you may have offended her with that last comment, and begin to worry about what she's going to do now. She then speaks up.

"Well, don't you want me to be nice to you? Do you want me to hurt you like those other girls might? I don't see what's so wrong with wanting to be nice to another person, especially one who is clearly scared of being suddenly brought into new surroundings by someone much bigger than them. I just don't get the point of wanting to cause harm to someone weaker than you. It doesn't feel good to get picked on, so why would I want to pick on someone else?"

The look on her face tells you that her words are sincere, and not just some ploy to catch you off guard. You begin to feel bad about assuming that she would want to hurt you. you suddenly notice a tear forming in the corner of her eye, and realize just how much your comment must have hurt her. At this point, you feel absolutely awful. You quickly climb up her arm and up to her shoulder. You proceed to hug her massive cheek, or at least as much of it as you can get your arms around... She is clearly surprised by you kind gesture and wipes the tears from her eyes as she looks back down at you.

"I'm sorry if I offended you, please don't cry... I was just surprised to be bought by someone as nice and caring as you... I've always been told that the day someone takes me home with them would be the worst day of my life. Instead, I meet the first person in my life who has ever shown me any kindness. I'm just surprised is all... I would love to be your friend, please please don't cry anymore. I'm really sorry if I hurt you, Siera..."

Hearing your heartfelt response, Siera began to cry even more. You begin to worry that you had said something that you shouldn't have, but you soon notice a smile returning to your new friends face. As she picks you up off her shoulder and holds you in front of her face, she again wipes the tears from her face as she decides to respond to your little speech.

"Thank you Gary... To be honest, I've never really had any friends... I'm always getting pick on by the other kids at school, and no one ever cared enough to even talk to me about it... I'm glad that you trust me."

Hearing this story, you begin to understand why she was being so nice to you; she knew exactly what it was like to be tormented by others. The look on her face told you that she didn't want you to go through what she had been through. Siera then walks over to her bed and lies down on it. She then positions you on top of her stomach so that you can talk to her easier. Looking at you sitting on her body with a smile on your face, Siera simply smiles back at you. The intense size difference between the two of you is still slightly intimidating, but you now feel completely safe with this giantess. You no longer have any doubts that she wants to be friends with you.

Just then, you turn around to notice that the door to Siera's room was cracked open, and her mom had been watching the whole thing!







What happens next?

145111.content:
Seeing Siera so distraught, you immediately run up to her and hug her leg.

"Don't worry Siera, everything will be alright... I'm here for you..."

She looks down at you in shock at the suddenness of your action, but quickly bends down to return your embrace. She was truly glad to have you as a friend. You decided to speak up and try to find out what had happened to make her so sad.

"So Siera, will you tell me what those girls did to you?"

Siera wiped the tears from her eyes and answered your question.

"Okay, Gary... You see, the whole thing started about a week before I bought you. The girls in my class were planning to have a party. They said that they were going to invite every girl in school... They kept on bragging about all of the stuff that they were going to have at it. It sounded really awesome, and I was really looking forward to it. Eventually, I got so excited that I couldn't wait anymore. I went up to them and asked them when the party was going to be..."

"When was it?"

"YESTERDAY! Apparently, they had the whole party yesterday, and I didn't even get invited! At first, I thought it had to be some mistake... I asked a bunch of the girls around the campus about it, and they always just laughed at me and said the same thing!"

"What did they say?"

"They said 'Oh, you didn't get the invitation? Well, if you had any value you would have been invited... I guess your just a loser!' Then they just laughed at me even more!"

At this point you were fuming! If you weren't so small, you would have stormed out of that room right then and there to give those girls a piece of your mind! You simply hugged Siera's leg even tighter, trying to comfort her to the best of your abilities.

"Don't worry Siera... Those girls don't know what they're talking about! You're not a loser, you're the nicest and most caring person that I've ever had the pleasure of knowing. I don't know why they can't see you for what your worth, but if they don't like you, then that's just their loss! They just won't have the honor of being friends with a girl as amazing as you! Remember... No matter what happens, I'm always going to be your friend. If you ever need a shoulder to cry on, you know where to find me! If only I were bigger, I could help out more; I may not be able to do much at this size, but the least I can do is stay by your side when you need me!"

Sierra started crying again. You were worried that your little speech had only made things worse, but you see her smile returning to her face and you realized just how happy it must have made her to have your support. She quickly brought you up to her face and began hugging you tighter than ever.

"Oh Gary, thank you so much! Your the best friend ever! What can I ever do to thank you?"

"Loosen your grip a bit!"

Siera was confused, but when she looked down she realized what you had meant. In the drama of the moment, she hadn't noticed just tightly she was hugging you. Seeing that you were having trouble breathing, she immediately releases her grip on you and puts you back down on the floor.

"Oh my gosh! I'm so sorry Gary! Are you okay?"

It takes you a few moments to catch your breath, but when you do, you respond to her.

"Yeah, I'm fine. Just remember that my box was marked 'fragile merchandise'..."

You both simply start laughing at your joke.

"I'm glad to see that you're feeling better, Siera..."

"Yeah... Thanks Gary... I really am glad to have you here... Is there anything that I can do to thank you for this?"

"Hmmm... Well... I think that ________________."

info.brief_description: You are in world were all men are born to be toys for girls.
info.description:
This is a world where Men are only born to be toys for Women. The most popular use for these "toys" is for them to be foot slaves or to work to tend to their owners feet. Their owners may do anything they want to their "toys" including having a child, if they are old enough. The owner and the toy are always the same age and age at the same rate. However if the owner is under the age of 13 then the toy will remain 13 until the owner is 13. Then the linked aging process will continue. Only a person over the age of 13 may purchase a toy at any given store, but they are available almost anywhere. A mother may purchase a toy for her daughter if she chooses to do so, no matter what age the daughter is.
If any toy decided to behave poorly or disobey their master then the master may use any type of force on their toy to make them obey. The master may choose just to kill their toy for fun, which is completely okay. The toy is like a little human and will need to be fed and watered regularly, so it is a responsibility.

Rules to additions:
1. No males over the hight of 3"
2. You cannot die but you can be harmed
3. Others can die
4. Sex is okay but remember all males must be or be under 3"
5. Your master may be able to change you size but not to make you bigger than 3"
6. Anthing else is allowed but try to keep it foot related.
7. Please keep away from parents
8. Please try to keep the story foot related, i don't mind other things just don't go to a completely different type of story.
9. Anything that shows your owner's power over you is ok, but again try to keep it foot related.
10. Thank you! =)
